mapper.update: UPDATE FORUM_CONTENT SET DISLIKE_COUNT = DISLIKE_COUNT + 1 WHERE ID = #{forumContentId}
UPDATE FORUM_CONTENT SET LIKE_COUNT = LIKE_COUNT + 1 WHERE ID = #{forumContentId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.VERSION, A.ORDER_NUMBER, A.THEME_REF_ID, A.CONTENT, A.PIC_FLAG, A.PIC_ID, A.LIKE_COUNT, A.DISLIKE_COUNT, A.ANONYMITYE, A.CREATER, B.USER_NAME, A.CREATE_TIME, A.CUSTOM1, A.CUSTOM2, A.CUSTOM3, A.CUSTOM4, A.CUSTOM5 FROM FORUM_CONTENT A LEFT JOIN LOGIN_DATA B ON A.CREATER = B.USERID WHERE A.THEME_REF_ID = #{themeId} ORDER BY A.ORDER_NUMBER LIMIT 0, 1
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) - 1 AS CHAR) FROM FORUM_CONTENT WHERE THEME_REF_ID = #{themeId}

SELECT A.ID, A.VERSION, A.ORDER_NUMBER, A.THEME_REF_ID, A.CONTENT, A.PIC_FLAG, A.PIC_ID, A.LIKE_COUNT, A.DISLIKE_COUNT, A.ANONYMITYE, A.CREATER, B.USER_NAME, A.CREATE_TIME, A.CUSTOM1, A.CUSTOM2, A.CUSTOM3, A.CUSTOM4, A.CUSTOM5 FROM FORUM_CONTENT A LEFT JOIN LOGIN_DATA B ON A.CREATER = B.USERID WHERE A.THEME_REF_ID = #{themeId} ORDER BY A.ORDER_NUMBER DESC LIMIT 0, 1

SELECT A.ID, A.VERSION, A.ORDER_NUMBER, A.THEME_REF_ID, A.CONTENT, A.PIC_FLAG, A.PIC_ID, A.LIKE_COUNT, A.DISLIKE_COUNT, A.ANONYMITYE, A.CREATER, B.USER_NAME, A.CREATE_TIME, A.CUSTOM1, A.CUSTOM2, A.CUSTOM3, A.CUSTOM4, A.CUSTOM5 FROM FORUM_CONTENT A LEFT JOIN LOGIN_DATA B ON A.CREATER = B.USERID WHERE A.THEME_REF_ID = #{0} AND A.ORDER_NUMBER != '1' ORDER BY A.LIKE_COUNT DESC,A.CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT #{1}, #{2}
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) FROM FORUM_CONTENT A WHERE A.THEME_REF_ID = #{0} AND A.ORDER_NUMBER != '1'
SELECT MAX(ORDER_NUMBER) FROM FORUM_CONTENT WHERE THEME_REF_ID = #{contentId}

SELECT B.*, A.THEME_CONTENT FROM FORUM_THEME A INNER JOIN FORUM_CONTENT B ON A.ID = B.THEME_REF_ID WHERE B.ORDER_NUMBER = (SELECT MAX(C.ORDER_NUMBER) FROM FORUM_CONTENT C WHERE B.THEME_REF_ID = C.THEME_REF_ID AND C.CREATER = #{userId}) AND B.ORDER_NUMBER != 1 ORDER BY B.CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT #{currentPageNumber}, #{num}

SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) FROM FORUM_THEME A INNER JOIN FORUM_CONTENT B ON A.ID = B.THEME_REF_ID WHERE B.ORDER_NUMBER = (SELECT MAX(C.ORDER_NUMBER) FROM FORUM_CONTENT C WHERE B.THEME_REF_ID = C.THEME_REF_ID AND C.CREATER = #{userId}) AND B.ORDER_NUMBER != 1

SELECT B.*, A.THEME_CONTENT FROM FORUM_THEME A INNER JOIN FORUM_CONTENT B ON A.ID = B.THEME_REF_ID INNER JOIN FOLLOW_THEME C ON A.ID = C.THEME_REF_ID WHERE B.ORDER_NUMBER = (SELECT MAX(C.ORDER_NUMBER) FROM FORUM_CONTENT C WHERE B.THEME_REF_ID = C.THEME_REF_ID) AND C.USERID = #{userId} AND B.ORDER_NUMBER != 1 ORDER BY B.CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT #{currentPageNumber}, #{num}

SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) FROM FORUM_THEME A INNER JOIN FORUM_CONTENT B ON A.ID = B.THEME_REF_ID INNER JOIN FOLLOW_THEME C ON A.ID = C.THEME_REF_ID WHERE B.ORDER_NUMBER = (SELECT MAX(C.ORDER_NUMBER) FROM FORUM_CONTENT C WHERE B.THEME_REF_ID = C.THEME_REF_ID) AND C.USERID = #{userId} AND B.ORDER_NUMBER != 1
